healthABM

Class Illness

  • java.lang.Object
    • healthABM.Illness

  • public class Illness
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a blueprint for each possible illness. Combining all instances of this class provides the full catalogue of illnesses. There is only one instance of each illness and it is independent of people actually suffering this illness.
    Author:
    biiacscide12

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double deltaProbDetectionInvest
      Marginal effect of diagnostic investment to the probability of detection (see eq:probCorrectDetection)
      double probMaxDectection
      Maximum probability of detection

    • Constructor Detail

      • Illness

        public Illness(java.lang.String name,
               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> betas,
               boolean contagious,
               boolean chronical,
               double severity,
               double deltaSev,
               int visibilitySymptoms,
               double probabilityDetection,
               java.util.ArrayList<Treatment> treat)
        Parameters:
        name - as String
        betas - HashMap of String,Double with all betas for the risk regression
        contagious - boolean being true if the illness is contagious
        chronical - boolean being true if the illness is chronical
        severity - Initial severity
        deltaSev - Change in severity by tick
        visibilitySymptoms - Number of ticks until symptoms are visible
        probabilityDetection - Probability of detection by health care provider
        treat - ArrayList of treatments

      • getCheapestSelfTreatment

        public Treatment getCheapestSelfTreatment()
        Returns the cheapest self-administered treatment.
        Returns:
        Treatment with the lowest cost, in case of not finding any, null is returned

      • getTreatments

        public java.util.ArrayList<Treatment> getTreatments(healthABM.TreatmentType type)
        Returns an array list of all treatments of a given type.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of treatment using TreatmentType
        Returns:
        ArrayList<Treatment> containing all treatments of the provided type
